name: Game of Panda
description:
Game Made for TriJam #149  with Theme Flipped.

 Small arcade game where the goal is to get higher score possible. 

 Controls are simple: left and right arrow.

Credits :

Art and code is done by me

Music : Tristan Lohengrin - Happy 8bit Loop 01

SFX: https://freesound.org/ , https://www.zapsplat.com/
